Aha Azim (ʿAẓīm Ashanti) bụ otu n'ime aha Allah na Islam, nke pụtara "Onye Ukwu" ma ọ bụ "Onye Nchebe" A na-ejikwa ya dị ka aha onwe onye, dị ka ụdị dị mkpirikpi nke Abdo flight, Abdul Azim, "Ohu nke Onye Ukwu"
Ọtụtụ ndị Sahrawi na-eji ya eme ihe dị ka aha nna sitere na Hassaniya Arabic.
Ndị ama ama nwere aha a gụnyere:
